title: Empowering People Affected by Autism | Flutie Foundation
description: The Doug Flutie Jr. Foundation for Autism empowers families and individuals affected by autism. Support autism awareness today.

Be Connected, Empowered, and Part of Our Autistic Community Discover the many ways your story and voice can be elevated to promote inclusion and acceptance for more people and families with autism. Learn about our STARS of the Spectrum Agency and how we can collaborate. Attend or Volunteer for an Event Combine your passion for exercise with your efforts to uplift the autism community by joining one of our Run Flutie global fundraising initiatives! Or start your own. Apply for a Grant The Flutie foundation is dedicated to helping families, communities, and individuals affected by autism. Our foundation offers several resources including our [Assistive Technology Grants](https://www.flutiefoundation.org/helping-communities/assistive-technology-grants/), [Joey's Fund l Hope Fund](https://www.flutiefoundation.org/helping-families/direct-financial-support/joeys-fund-hope-fund/), the Impact Grant](https://www.flutiefoundation.org/helping-communities/autism-community-impact-grant/), [Direct Family Safety Grants](https://www.flutiefoundation.org/helping-families/safety-home-community/direct-family-safety-grants/), and more! Engage Your Community and Make It Your Own Get creative and organize your own event that brings together your friends, family, and community. Host a bowling tournament, paint night, spin class...the possibilities are endless! Your time and energy directly help people and families with autism. Support Autism Create Opportunities for People and Families Affected by Autism Thanks to your generous support, we are building a deeper impact in the autism community. Together, we are ensuring every person and family affected by autism feels Safe, Supported, Educated, Active, Employed, Social, and Informed. [ Your generous gift today will directly change the life of a person or family with autism.
